Text: Greetings, seeker. The crystal ball reveals much about your Valentine future... Will your day be filled with LOVE or DANGER? Do you dare discover the truth?
The spirits are consulting...
Excellent! Let's see what the universe has in store for you...
Interesting choice...
Ah, {name}. A wise choice.
Notes: After player types who they trust ({name} gets replaced)

Text: Your fortune has been revealed...
Okay! Well, have a cookie anyway.
First question: Pick a sense that you trust.
Second question: Who do you trust? (Type a name)
Final question: Choose a season.
You will have a sandwich today.
BLESSING: Your next meal will be exactly what you need
CURSE: You will think about this sandwich for 48 hours
You must eat bread in some form within 3 hours or ELSE
Share this with someone who needs a sandwich. They will receive good bread today.
Your socks will match tomorrow.
BLESSING: Small victories will compound
CURSE: You will notice everyone else's mismatched socks forever
You must compliment someone's feet within 24 hours or ELSE
Share this with someone with cold feet. They will find their lost sock.
An email awaits you in your inbox.
BLESSING: It contains exactly what you hoped for
CURSE: You will check your email 47 times today
You must send an email to someone you miss within 1 hour or ELSE
Share this with someone who never checks email. They will finally unsubscribe from spam.
You will drink water soon.
BLESSING: Hydration brings clarity
CURSE: You will be thirsty at inconvenient moments all week
You must drink a full glass of water right now or ELSE
Share this with someone who is dehydrated. They will discover the perfect water fountain.
A chair will support your weight.
BLESSING: You will always find a place to rest
CURSE: You will think about chairs every time you sit for a month
You must sit in 5 different chairs today or ELSE
Share this with someone who stands too much. They will find the comfiest chair.
Your heart knows a love that society cannot name. The stars do not judge what the world condemns.
BLESSING: Your secrets make you powerful
CURSE: Everyone will sense your forbidden desires
You must text someone you shouldn't be thinking about within 2 hours or ELSE
Share this with someone who breaks rules. They will get away with something today.
In shadows you will find what daylight denies you. Your love is the secret the moon keeps.
BLESSING: The night protects what matters
CURSE: Sunlight will reveal what you've hidden
You must stay up past midnight thinking about them or ELSE
Share this with someone who loves the dark. They will have the best night of their week.
What is forbidden tastes sweeter in darkness. Your desire will outlive their rules.
BLESSING: Your rebellion will inspire others
CURSE: Authority figures will watch you closely for 3 days
You must do something slightly forbidden today or ELSE
Share this with someone who follows too many rules. They will break one today.
You will write their name in the margin of your thoughts, again and again, unread.
BLESSING: Your longing makes you a better person
CURSE: You will see their face in strangers for 7 days
You must listen to a sad song and think about them for exactly 4 minutes or ELSE
Share this with someone who pines. They will finally get a text back.
The song you hear will remind you of someone who doesn't think of you. This is not punishment, it is practice.
BLESSING: Every heartbreak is preparation for the real thing
CURSE: Their favorite song will play everywhere you go this week
You must cry about it or write about it within 24 hours or ELSE
Share this with someone with a broken heart. They will hear the perfect song today.
Your love is a letter you will never send. But you will become a better writer for it.
BLESSING: Unreturned love becomes art
CURSE: You will accidentally like their old Instagram post
You must write down what you would say to them and then delete it or ELSE
Share this with someone who overthinks. They will stop checking their phone today.
Fire recognizes fire. You will burn together or burn alone, but you will burn.
BLESSING: Intensity is your superpower
CURSE: You will want someone inappropriate this week
You must tell someone how you really feel within 3 hours or ELSE
Share this with someone who loves too hard. They will combust beautifully today.
Your kiss will feel like coming home to a house that's on fire. Enter anyway.
BLESSING: Danger makes everything better
CURSE: Safe options will bore you for a month
You must kiss someone (or something) with full commitment today or ELSE
Share this with someone who plays it safe. They will take a risk today.
Desire will consume you like summer consumes ice. Melt. It's the only way.
BLESSING: Giving in is sometimes the answer
CURSE: You will be distracted by desire at the worst times
You must do something impulsive within 2 hours or ELSE
Share this with someone who overthinks everything. They will act without thinking today.
Someone will look at you like you're made of flowers. They're right.
BLESSING: Softness is strength
CURSE: You will cry at a commercial about dogs
You must give someone flowers (real or imaginary) today or ELSE
Share this with someone who is gentle. They will receive unexpected kindness.
Your love will taste like honey and feel like Sunday morning. This is not boring. This is rare.
BLESSING: Peace is underrated and you have found it
CURSE: Chaos will seem appealing but wrong
You must have breakfast food at any time of day or ELSE
Share this with someone who is tired. They will sleep perfectly tonight.
Hand-holding will solve more than you think it will. Try it.
BLESSING: Simple joys multiply
CURSE: Your hands will feel empty when alone
You must hold someone's hand for at least 30 seconds today or ELSE
Share this with someone who needs touch. They will get the best hug today.
Your relationship will be a beautiful disaster. The wreckage will be worth photographing.
BLESSING: Mess is memorable
CURSE: You will create drama where there was none
You must start an argument about something silly today or ELSE
Share this with someone dramatic. They will cause a scene today.
Love will hit you like a car you didn't see coming. Check both ways next time. Or don't.
BLESSING: Unpredictability keeps you alive
CURSE: Nothing will go according to plan for 48 hours
You must change plans last minute today or ELSE
Share this with someone organized. They will lose something important today.
You will love the wrong person for the right reasons. The story will be incredible.
BLESSING: Bad decisions make the best stories
CURSE: You will be attracted to red flags all week
You must do something you know you shouldn't within 4 hours or ELSE
Share this with someone sensible. They will make a questionable choice today.
The scent of them will haunt you in grocery stores and parking lots. Ghosts are everywhere.
BLESSING: Memory keeps love alive forever
CURSE: You will smell their perfume/cologne on a stranger
You must smell something that reminds you of them today or ELSE
Share this with someone nostalgic. They will find an old photo today.
You will wonder what could have been. The answer is: exactly this much wondering.
BLESSING: Curiosity is better than certainty
CURSE: You will dream about them tonight
You must look at an old photo or message from them or ELSE
Share this with someone who looks backward. They will get closure today.
Time will not heal this. But time will make it beautiful in a way that hurts less.
BLESSING: Pain becomes art becomes wisdom
CURSE: You will feel the ache in quiet moments for a week
You must tell a story about them to someone today or ELSE
Share this with someone grieving. They will remember something beautiful today.
Butterflies in your stomach are just your body trying to fly toward someone. Let it.
BLESSING: Nervousness means you care
CURSE: You will be awkward at the wrong moment
You must talk to someone new within 3 hours or ELSE
Share this with someone single. They will meet someone interesting today.
The beginning is always golden. You are in the beginning. Everything is possible.
BLESSING: Fresh starts erase old mistakes
CURSE: You will compare this to something old
You must try something for the first time today or ELSE
Share this with someone scared of change. They will start something new today.
Someone new will see you as someone new. Become that person.
BLESSING: You can reinvent yourself at any moment
CURSE: Your past self will try to sabotage this
You must introduce yourself differently to someone today or ELSE
Share this with someone stuck. They will have a chance to start over today.
The greatest love story you will ever have is with yourself. It has a happy ending.
BLESSING: You will always have yourself
CURSE: You will be alone with your thoughts for 2 hours
You must spend 30 minutes doing something alone that you love or ELSE
Share this with someone lonely. They will enjoy their own company today.
You are enough. Not in a self-help book way. In a real way. In an every way.
BLESSING: Other people's opinions will matter less
CURSE: You will catch yourself seeking validation
You must compliment yourself out loud in a mirror or ELSE
Share this with someone insecure. They will see their worth today.
Take yourself on a date. Dress up. You deserve someone who shows up for you.
BLESSING: You will treat yourself better than anyone else could
CURSE: You will notice how often you put yourself last
You must buy yourself something nice or do something special for yourself today or ELSE
Share this with someone who gives too much. They will receive something beautiful today.
